# 6.0 Docs

## Core .NET libraries

- [EventSource callback behavior](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/eventsource-callback.md): Learn about the .NET 6 servicing breaking change in core .NET libraries where the 'EventSource' is marked as disabled before the callback is issue for an 'EventCommand.Disable'.
- [API obsoletions with non-default diagnostic IDs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/obsolete-apis-with-custom-diagnostics.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where some APIs have been marked as obsolete with a custom diagnostic ID.
- [Conditional string evaluation in Debug methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/debug-assert-conditional-evaluation.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where strings are conditionally evaluated in Debug.Assert, Debug.WriteIf, and Debug.WriteLineIf.
- [Environment.ProcessorCount behavior on Windows](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/environment-processorcount-on-windows.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where Environment.ProcessorCount may return a different value on Windows compared to previous .NET versions.
- [File.Replace on Unix throws exceptions to match Windows](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/file-replace-exceptions-on-unix.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where File.Replace throws exceptions in more cases on Unix-based operating systems.
- [FileStream locks files with shared lock on Unix](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/filestream-file-locks-unix.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where FileStream.Lock now locks files with a read lock when they're opened with read permissions on Unix.
- [FileStream no longer synchronizes offset with OS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/filestream-doesnt-sync-offset-with-os.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where FileStream doesn't synchronize the file offset with the operating system.
- [FileStream.Position updated after completion](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/filestream-position-updates-after-readasync-writeasync-completion.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where FileStream.Position is updated after ReadAsync or WriteAsync completion.
- [New diagnostic IDs for obsoleted APIs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/diagnostic-id-change-for-obsoletions.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where the diagnostic ID for some obsoletions was changed.
- [New Queryable method overloads](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/additional-linq-queryable-method-overloads.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where additional method overloads were added to the System.Linq.Queryable type.
- [Nullability annotation changes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/nullable-ref-type-annotation-changes.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where some nullable reference type annotations have changed.
- [Older framework versions dropped](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/older-framework-versions-dropped.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where older framework versions have been dropped from the core libraries packages.
- [Parameter names changed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/parameter-name-changes.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where some parameter names have changed to be consistent between reference and implementation assemblies.
- [Parameters renamed in Stream-derived types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/parameters-renamed-on-stream-derived-types.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where some parameter names in methods of Stream-derived types were changed.
- [Partial and zero-byte reads in streams](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/partial-byte-reads-in-streams.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where DeflateStream, GZipStream, and CryptoStream handle partial and zero-byte reads differently.
- [Set timestamp on read-only file on Windows](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/set-timestamp-readonly-file.md): Learn about the .NET 6 servicing release breaking change where you can now set the timestamp on a read-only file on Windows.
- [Standard numeric format parsing precision](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/numeric-format-parsing-handles-higher-precision.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where standard numeric format parsing now handles higher precisions.
- [Static abstract members in interfaces](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/static-abstract-interface-methods.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where `static` interface members can now be marked `abstract`.
- [StringBuilder.Append overloads and evaluation order](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/stringbuilder-append-evaluation-order.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where new overloads were added to StringBuilder.Append and StringBuilder.AppendLine that may result in different runtime behavior.
- [Strong-name APIs throw PlatformNotSupportedException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/strong-name-signing-exceptions.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where an exception is thrown in StrongNameKeyPair constructors and AssemblyName.KeyPair.
- [System.Drawing.Common only supported on Windows](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/system-drawing-common-windows-only.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where the System.Drawing.Common package is no longer supported on non-Windows operating systems.
- [System.Security.SecurityContext is marked obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/securitycontext-obsolete.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where the System.Security.SecurityContext type is marked obsolete.
- [Task.FromResult might return singleton](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/task-fromresult-returns-singleton.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where Task.FromResult may return a singleton.
- [Unhandled exceptions from a BackgroundService](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/hosting-exception-handling.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in core .NET libraries where unhandled exceptions from a BackgroundService are logged instead of lost.

## XML and XSLT

- [XNodeReader.GetAttribute behavior for invalid index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/6.0/xnodereader-getattribute.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where XNodeReader.GetAttribute now throws an exception for an invalid index.
